name: PHOTOPHOBIA (Liberty Jones)
description:
“Glomp” is a young demon set to take over the role of The Watcher in Hell; the one who accepts damned souls and sends them on their way. But before he can take over the job, he must first be sent to Earth and prove himself worthy. After being transformed into a weak pile of slime, he must gather fear from humans and grow his strength, where he can eventually return to Hell and become the greatest Watcher in demon history. There is just one rule: he must not touch the light.

Controls:
W: Move back (away from the camera).
A: Move left.
S: Move forward (towards camera).
D: Move right.
E: Interact with object.
SPACE: Jump. (Only available on the third level).
ESC: Pause.

Made as part of a University assignment.
Theme: "You are the monster".
Genre: 3D platformer, puzzle, horror.

Programs used:

  • Developed in Unity.
  • Models made in Blender.
  • Textures made in Substance Painter and Photoshop.
  • SFX made in Audacity.
  • Animations from Mixamo.
  • Music made by Fesliyan Studios.

Please note that there may be bugs!
